I'm A Full-Time Traveler

My life is lived one city at a time. Some consider me lucky, I consider myself passion driven.

I travel, and write about it, to inspire people redfined something “impossible” as achievable a lot sooner than expected.

A Beard Across America

A Beard Across America is a passion project inspired by my trip across America at the end of 2013. Inside the eBook, you will find stories about the 18 cities I visited, each written to inspire readers to look at something impossible, like a four week road trip across the country, as something that can be accomplished easier than expected.

Check Out #ABAA
